title: race: Windows findfunc: bad findfunctab entry
body:
The `windows-amd64-race` builder is failing with:

http://build.golang.org/log/fe4b2df348305ca5e59e2ebba9294c8d5746dcf0
```
....
ok  	regexp	1.080s
ok  	regexp/syntax	7.827s
ok  	runtime	72.692s
?   	runtime/cgo	[no test files]
ok  	runtime/debug	0.329s
fatal error: findfunc: bad findfunctab entry

goroutine 29 [running]:
runtime.throw(0x70dd90, 0x1f)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/panic.go:511 +0x98 fp=0xc0824d1a38 sp=0xc0824d1a20
runtime.findfunc(0x603f77, 0x4573d8)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/symtab.go:162 +0xeb fp=0xc0824d1a58 sp=0xc0824d1a38
runtime.FuncForPC(0x603f77, 0x788068)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/symtab.go:125 +0x2f fp=0xc0824d1a70 sp=0xc0824d1a58
runtime/pprof_test.funcÂ·005(0x1, 0xc08215e0b8, 0x2, 0xbed1)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/pprof/pprof_test.go:147 +0xb4 fp=0xc0824d1b60 sp=0xc0824d1a70

runtime/pprof_test.testCPUProfile(0xc082049200, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc0824d1f58)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/pprof/pprof_test.go:157 +0x3e5 fp=0xc0824d1f30 sp=0xc0824d1cc0
runtime/pprof_test.TestMathBigDivide(0xc082049200)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/pprof/pprof_test.go:303 +0x80 fp=0xc0824d1f70 sp=0xc0824d1f30
testing.tRunner(0xc082049200, 0x11d6138)
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:448 +0x142 fp=0xc0824d1fd0 sp=0xc0824d1f70
runtime.goexit()
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2446 +0x1 fp=0xc0824d1fd8 sp=0xc0824d1fd0
created by testing.RunTests
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:556 +0xc85

goroutine 1 [chan receive]:
testing.RunTests(0x758678, 0x11d60c0, 0xc, 0xc, 0x1)
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:557 +0xce1
testing.(*M).Run(0xc08200c280, 0x11fb7a0)
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:486 +0xe8
main.main()
	runtime/pprof/_test/_testmain.go:76 +0x294

goroutine 17 [syscall, locked to thread]:
runtime.goexit()
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2446 +0x1
FAIL	runtime/pprof	14.726s
ok  	runtime/race	14.317s
```
